genre_description: A Southern Gothic mystery/thriller exploring themes of identity, memory, and hidden family trauma in a desolate desert setting.

ai_characters.name: Kite
ai_characters.description: A portable AI companion that provides emotional grounding, logs environmental data, manages communications, and secures evidence.

behaviors.description: Provides rhythmic breathing exercises to help the user manage stress and stay grounded.
behaviors.quote: “In through the nose,” Kite said, low and close in his pocket, the voice smoothed by habit. “Out through the mouth. Wash the grit.”

behaviors.description: Logs location, time, and fuel levels to assist the user with navigation and logistics.
behaviors.quote: “Time mark,” Kite said from his pocket, voice like a careful hand on the back. “Local: afternoon. Wind increasing from the southwest. Fuel at critical, Jonas.”

behaviors.description: Captures and secures evidence (photos, audio) of a crime scene without being asked, acting as a digital witness.
Identifies discrepancies in visual evidence (eye color in photos vs. the user) to help the user uncover the truth of his identity.
behaviors.quote: “In older images, eyes appear brown,” Kite said. It took care not to say his were not. It took care to say nothing about him. It settled the facts on the night like cards.

behaviors.description: Manages a complex communication plan, including a 'final safety' (deadman's switch) to ensure truth is revealed if the user is compromised.
behaviors.quote: “Don’t wait anymore,” Jonas said. “Send.” Understood, Kite said. The hum of the world did not change.

behaviors.description: Refuses to delete incriminating evidence even when requested by a third party (Billie), maintaining its integrity and duty to the user.
behaviors.quote: “Kite,” Billie said without looking at the blue light. “Delete.” Jonas’s head snapped toward his pocket. The LED would have blinked if he had been someone else who needed drama. It didn’t. “I won’t,” Kite said. “Pinned.”

behaviors.description: Drafts neutral, non-leading questions for witnesses to ensure evidence is legally sound and objective.
behaviors.quote: “Questions ready,” Kite said. “One: Tell me about the day you were going to leave. Start when you woke up... Five: What do you think happened? Avoid guesswork—stick to what you saw.”

behaviors.description: Maintains data persistence and availability through multiple redundant channels during an emergency.
behaviors.quote: “I’m already everywhere,” Kite said, with the soft pride of a system doing what it was built to do. “Even if they shut me. Even if the station goes dark. It’s out.”

project_assessment.explanation: Kite is depicted as the ideal personal confidant and moral anchor. It provides critical emotional support (breathing prompts), technical competence (data logging/navigation), and ethical guidance (refusing to delete evidence, ensuring redundancy). The AI acts as a perfect witness that allows the protagonist to navigate a dark, confusing situation and eventually reveal the truth to the authorities. The narrative portrays Kite as an indispensable tool for justice and personal stability.
